channel.title: Atlantic Records on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Atlantic Records on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Clairo Signs Record Deal with Atlantic Records
item.description: The “Juna” singer hit viral status in 2017 with her song “Pretty Girl” and was recently nominated for her first Grammy for her 2024 record ‘Charm.’

item.title: Clairo Signs Record Deal with Atlantic Records
item.description: The “Juna” singer hit viral status in 2017 with her song “Pretty Girl” and was recently nominated for her first Grammy for her 2024 record ‘Charm.’

item.title: Hilary Duff Plots Return to Music, Signs Record Deal With Atlantic
item.description: Duff’s musical comeback will be chronicled with a docuseries from Sam Wrench, whose credits include ‘Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour’ and ‘A No Nonsense Christmas with Sabrina Carpenter.’
